text: The Ramanathapuram police registered a case against four persons for allegedly attempting to murder a man over a real estate dispute. The police said that S. Veerasamy (56) of Sriram Colony on Nanjundapuram Road had given the documents of a land to Thandaiyuthapani to sell it. Thandaiyuthapani sold the land, but did not give the money to Veerasamy. Around 10 p.m. on Sunday, Thandaiyuthapani and three of his associates, Dhanasekar, Danraj and Ganeshkumar, picked a quarrel with Veerasamy, and Dhanasekar allegedly stabbed him. Veerasamy was admitted in a nearby private hospital. The four persons were booked under Section 307 (attempt to murder) of the Indian Penal Code.
title: Case registered
